name: above
chn: prep. 在 (或向) …上面. adv. 在 (向) 上面
example_en: The bird flew above the clouds.
word_family: aboveboard (adj. 光明正大的), above-mentioned (adj. 上述的)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'abufan'，由 'a-'（在...上）和 'bufan'（在...之上）组成。联想记忆：想象一个气球（balloon）在头顶上方（above）飘浮。图像记忆：画一个气球在云层上方飞翔的场景。

image_prompt.main_image: A colorful hot air balloon floating above a layer of fluffy white clouds, with a bright blue sky in the background.
image_prompt.example_image: A bird with outstretched wings soaring gracefully above a sea of clouds, with the sun shining brightly in the background.
